modName: Cosy Whiterun Player Home - Ergonomic and Clear
summary: All you need in the game in one place, lore friendly, custom items, nice looking.
descriptionHtml:
0. DESCRIPTION
====================================================================
Tired of too big houses too far from towns? No need anymore. The house contains everything you need and is situated in the middle of Skyrim- Whiterun. Some of the contents:

-Forge (+all: smithing table, tanning rack etc.), enchanting table, alchemy lab - all you need in one place,

-Custom static objects and containers,

-TELEPORT Stone, which can teleport you to any of the major towns in Skyrim!, teleport by using stone in main room,

-Cosy, comfortable, with no irritating and buggy stuff - just the essentials, provided by the game,

-Many containers to segregate all your stuff, bookshelves etc.,

-Custom music from Morrowind.



Hope you enjoy, notify me with your thoughts and endorse if you like it! :)


*Key to the treasure room is in Keys Box on the desk




Update 1.1!

- trap door to Heimskr\'s house added near the house, thanks for the idea to perrob
- dagger rack working properly


Update 1.2!

-added many weapon racks, mannequins in basement, dagger rack shelf

*Warning*
New images show textures from Soolie\'s \"Tropical Skyrim\" mod and are not included. If you like them, you must download the Tropical Skyrim mod!

1. INSTALLATION
====================================================================
After extracting simply copy the contents of \\\\\\\'Data\\\\\\\' folder to your Data folder, where Skyrim is installed. Remember to have the House.esp file ticked in \\\\\\\'Data Files\\\\\\\'.


2. UNINSTALLATION
====================================================================
Delete the files you added or just untick the mod from \\\\\\\'Data Files\\\\\\\'.


3. THANKS TO
====================================================================
- Oaristys and Tony67 for Modders Resource Pack
* http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16525

- Blary for PotionShelf Resource, Ingredients in a Jar Resource, Ingredients Wall Art Resource
*http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14136
*http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30601
*http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30602

- Bethesda for the ESO series

~mikolajgos
author: mikolajgos
